languages.text: {n}Наместник — вновь Наместник! — выглядит усталым, но... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}удовлетворенным происходящим вокруг{/d}. Дробно стуча пальцами по инфопластине, он отсылает указание за указанием.{/n} "Ваша Светлость? Может ли Футфол чем-то отблагодарить вас за освобождение?"

{n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"
languages.original_text: {n}Наместник — вновь Наместник! — выглядит усталым, но... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}удовлетворенным происходящим вокруг{/d}. Дробно стуча пальцами по инфопластине, он отсылает указание за указанием.{/n} "Ваша Светлость? Может ли Футфол чем-то отблагодарить вас за освобождение?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Liege — now a Liege again! — is looking tired but... pleased with what's going on around him. His fingers rap away at his datasheet as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

His fingers rap away at his datasheet as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆终于又坐上了总督之位。尽管他看起来很疲惫，但他似乎{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}对周围发生的一切都很满意{/d}。他一边用手指敲打着数据板，一边传达着一条又一条指示。{/n}“您来了，大人？您帮助落脚港重获自由，我们该怎么报答您呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆终于又坐上了总督之位。尽管他看起来很疲惫，但他似乎对周围发生的一切都很满意。他一边用手指敲打着数据板，一边下达着一条又一条指示。{/n}“您来了，大人？您帮助落脚港重获自由，我们该怎么报答您呢？”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}新たに立ったばかりの領主はとても疲れて見えるが、しかし…{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}周囲の出来事を楽しんでいるようだ{/d}。彼は指でデータスレートを叩きながら、次々と指示を出している。{/n}「陛下、フットフォール解放のお礼として、何か出来ることはありませんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

traits.locale_text: {n}新たに立ったばかりの領主はとても疲れて見えるが、しかし…{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}周囲の出来事を楽しんでいるようだ{/d}。彼は指でデータシートを叩きながら、次々と指示を出している。{/n}「陛下、フットフォール解放のお礼として、何か出来ることはありませんか？」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}El Señor recién restaurado parece cansado, pero {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}satisfecho con lo que ocurre a su alrededor{/d}. Sus dedos resuenan en la tablilla de datos mientras envía una instrucción tras otra.{/n} «¿Mi{mf|lord|lady}? ¿Hay algo que pueda hacer Paso para agradecerle su liberación?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El Señor, que vuelve a ser Señor, parece cansado pero satisfecho con lo que ocurre a su alrededor. Sus dedos resuenan en la tabla de datos mientras envía una instrucción tras otra.{/n} «¿Mi{mf|lord|lady}? ¿Hay algo que pueda hacer Paso para agradecerle su liberación?».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Der Lehnsherr — frisch wiederhergestellt- wirkt müde, aber ... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}zufrieden mit allem, was um ihn herum vor sich geht{/d}. Seine Finger tippen auf seinem Datablock herum, während er eine Anweisung nach der anderen gibt.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft? Kann Footfall sich irgendwie für seine Befreiung erkenntlich zeigen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Lehnsherr — nun wieder ein Lehnsherr! — wirkt müde, aber ... zufrieden mit allem, was um ihn herum vor sich geht. Seine Finger tippen auf seinem Datenblatt herum, während er eine Anweisung nach der anderen gibt.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft? Kann Footfall sich irgendwie für seine Befreiung erkenntlich zeigen?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}L'ancien suzerain redevenu suzerain semble fatigué... mais aussi {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}satisfait de ce qui se passe autour de lui{/d}. Ses doigts tapotent rapidement sa plaque de données pour envoyer des instructions les unes à la suite des autres.{/n} « Oui, Votre Seigneurie ? Y a-t-il quelque chose que Castel puisse faire pour vous remercier de sa libération ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ex-suzerain redevenu suzerain semble fatigué, mais aussi satisfait de ce qui se passe autour de lui. Ses doigts tapotent rapidement sa plaque de données pour envoyer des instructions les unes à la suite des autres.{/n} « Oui, Votre Seigneurie ? Y a-t-il quelque chose que Castel puisse faire pour vous remercier de sa libération ? »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Makamının başına tekrar geçen Emîr yorgun görünse de... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}Belli ki olan bitenden memnun{/d}. Databelasını kurcalayan parmakları emir üstüne emir gönderiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir buyruğunuz var mıydı? Binliman size olan borcunu nasıl ödeyebilir?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Liege — newly restored — looks tired but... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}pleased with what is going on around him{/d}. His fingers rap away at his data-slate as he sends out instruction after instruction.{/n} "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship? Is there anything Footfall can do to thank you for its liberation?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Makamının başına tekrar geçen Emîr yorgun görünse de... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Footfall_VladaymLiege}belli ki olan bitenden memnun{/d}. Databelasını kurcalayan parmakları emir üstüne emir gönderiyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir buyruğunuz var mıydı? Binliman size olan borcunu nasıl ödeyebilir?"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
